body: Oh, I somehow assumed we were figuring out whether to apply 1-d or 2-d dropout inside the `at::dropout` call because I didn't see a `at::dropout2d` Function. Looking at `functional.py` I now see this function is called `feature_dropout`. I'll fix this PR then and also add Dropout3d while I'm at it.
body_html: Oh, I somehow assumed we were figuring out whether to apply 1-d or 2-d dropout inside the at::dropout call because I didn't see a at::dropout2d Function. Looking at functional.py I now see this function is called feature_dropout. I'll fix this PR then and also add Dropout3d while I'm at it.
body_text: Oh, I somehow assumed we were figuring out whether to apply 1-d or 2-d dropout inside the at::dropout call because I didn't see a at::dropout2d Function. Looking at functional.py I now see this function is called feature_dropout. I'll fix this PR then and also add Dropout3d while I'm at it.
